SEARCH
Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.brews

Class LoggerBrew

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus.EventBusPublisher
net.cnoga.paint.core.brews.LoggerBrew
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class LoggerBrew extends EventBusPublisher implements Runnable
Background file logger that asynchronously writes timestamped application events to a session log file. Log entries are queued to avoid blocking UI or event threads.

Console output continues through Log4j; this class only handles session file output.

Call shutdown() during application exit to stop the logging thread.
